sections.heading: level rehabilitation center, defined
sections.text: Intermediate level rehabilitation center means a rehabilitation center which provides rehabilitative services to individuals with musculoskeletal trauma, peripheral nerve lesions, lower extremity amputations, and other diagnoses resulting in functional impairment

71-8220.01.Intermediate level rehabilitation center, defined.

Intermediate level rehabilitation center means a rehabilitation center which provides rehabilitative services to individuals with musculoskeletal trauma, peripheral nerve lesions, lower extremity amputations, and other diagnoses resulting in functional impairment in one or more functional areas, with moderate to severe impairment or complexity.

SourceLaws 1997, LB 626, ยง 6;R.S.1943, (2009), ยง 71-8206;Laws 2015, LB46, ยง 6.
